item.title: Lock Phone From Android Wear
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Security means everything to me. I am that guy who uses two step authentication on everything, along with safety backups and more. When it comes to security on Android, things aren’t as tight as I would like them to be. On my S6, my favorite thing to use is the fingerprint scanner. I am aware that the fingerprint scanner does not offer better security than a strong password or lock pattern (although you could easily bypass the Android Lockscreen pattern), however, it will deter most people fromÂ trying to snoop around in my phone.
